tool_description: An API showing all latest Climate change new worldwide
name: Climate change live news
title: Climate change live news

api_list.name: Get individual source
api_list.description: Get news about climate change from an individual source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-news5.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-news5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
